Package io.hbt.bubblegum.core.kademlia.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityExecutionContext
    The asynchronous execution context of a Bubblegum instance.
    ActivityExecutionManager
    Task-class worker pool management instance.
    ActivityExecutionWorker
    Single activity execution thread pool worker.
    BootstrapActivity
    Implements the Kademlia bootstrap operation.
    FindActivity
    Implementation of the FIND_NODE and FIND_VALUE RPCs.
    LookupActivity
    Implementation of the DHT lookup operation.
    NetworkActivity
    Implementation of a generic UDP-based network activity.
    PingActivity
    Implementation of the PING RPC.
    PrimitiveStoreActivity
    Implementation of the STORE RPC.
    QueryActivity
    Implementation of the QUERY RPC.
    ResourceRequestActivity
    Implementation of the RESOLVE RPC.
    StoreActivity
    Implementation of the compound store operation.
    SyncActivity
    Implementation of the SYNC RPC activity.
    SystemActivity
    The generic template for RPC/compound activities in bubblegum-core.
